reviews.author: Jake Burgess
reviews.review: I rented from Bob a few years back on his Southbend Place property in Bellingham. Bob takes OK care of his property (when pressed) but I have two main issues with his practices.

reviews.author: Alicia Lycan
reviews.review: Had a wonderful experience renting from Bob, its great to see a landlord take great care of his properties and is attentive to his tenants.

reviews.author: Riley Morgan
reviews.review: Will deny you/refuse to schedule a viewing for illegal reasons, really makes you wonder what other illegal practices they have going on here
